thread.title: How Nick Saban Could Help Bill Belichick Win a Super Bowl

author: Andrew Beaton
title: How Nick Saban Could Help Bill Belichick Win a Super Bowl
text:
Bloomington, Minn.
The Super Bowl will come down to a scheme that has rankled college football coaches for years and capsized traditional NFL offenses more recently. When executed to perfection, it makes the best defenses look witless and the best coaches feel helpless.
Run-pass options have never been more important than in todayâ€™s modern...
